short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the button that shows the status notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you do want not to see the new status of your contacts on the page because this notification does distract you. This tool is perfect to increase your productivity.
